jobDescription: Aquent LLC is the global leader in marketing and creative staffing for 30 years. Privately held, Aquent, LLC operates 2 brands (Aquent and Vitamin T) spanning 7 countries and 40 plus cities. We are seeking a Data Analyst that thrives in a results-driven environment that is progressive and innovative.  The Data Analyst would be responsible for analyzing Aquent’s financial and operational data and delivering insights from the data to various business owners throughout the organization.  The ideal candidate will have analytical skills and the ability to work both with analysts and business owners.Job duties
